RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 3500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIC LAICO BIRD fired, strong finish. AWESOM BLACEY clean trip, got place nod. FAST DASHIN FEFE off best,caught. CORONA FOR BRONCA bid, missed show. KOOL COMMENT close, outfinished.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 300 Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 6500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REACH THRU drifted out, speedy. CARTERS CHICAWA outdueled. BROOKES BRIONI hugged rail, edged. WOW ITS JESS in tight midway. AJS WILD N OUT raced wide. BELLA MARIE forced to check midway.

ENTRY.NAME: Brookes Brioni
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Brian Dean Scott and Velasco Lynda Erica

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Marie
ENTRY.OWNER: Schaefer Sr Clinton and Schaefer Jr Clinton

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 3500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEWY LEWI refused to lose. TTT IVAN MOONWALKER off best, caught. PATTERNS OF INSANITY closing fast at finish. MONTE DE CARAMELO gained experience. QUICK QUINCE steadily faded. ES LA REYNA DE RF no menace.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 7300. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TG CINNAMON COUP weaved, kicked clear. KB SWEET JESSE hooked a toughie. EYESA FIVE BAR bumped, fought on. ONE SWEET ANGEL late to level. SHEZA LOUISIANA DOLL no response to urging. CANTKEEPAGOODGIRLDWN off slow.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 400 Y Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISE ANOTHER PINT inching away. MY CORONA BLUES kicked by fractious foe. ENERGY PAINT broke in, mild gain. MIXED BLOOD went evenly. INDESTRUCTABLE forced in early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GT N BOOS RUNAWAY strong late strides. JESSABLUESMAN dueled all the way. DASHIN MOONIE bid, outfinished. FASTDASH PILOT chased dueling trio. MAJESTICS BEST GAME unable to match stride. JM TEE COS MON COEUR urged, empty. JJS LACE went to nose at break.

ENTRY.NAME: Majestics Best Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Williams Ralph A and Vincent Jr Floyd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELENTLESS TRES focused, fired, fast. TWTOMMYCARTELTOFAME floated in, second best. XF AJS HERO bored in, impeded foe. VESTA second flight duel. WUHAN CORONA bid, not enough. SHAY DINKY steadily weakened. PAQUITA PERRY PILOTO crowded out midway. DONT TREAD ON ME TO squeezed back midway. After an INQUIRY, the board of stewards disqualified 8: XF AJS HERO from 3rd to 8th
